places.name: Loveland Living Planet Aquarium
places.address: 12033 S Lone Peak Pkwy, Draper, UT 84020
places.description: A 136,000 ft² aquatic attraction showcasing global ecosystems—from Utah waterways to ocean habitats—with penguins, sharks, sloths, and interactive exhibits.

places.name: Draper Utah Temple
places.description: A 57,000 ft² LDS temple on a 12-acre site, notable for its towering spire, Moroni statue, landscaped grounds, and mountain backdrop.

places.name: Andy Ballard Arena
places.address: 1600 E Highland Dr (13675 S), Draper, UT 84020
places.description: Hosts equestrian events, rodeos, monster truck shows, and serves as a trailhead location during Draper events.

places.name: Draper City Park
places.description: Large community park with two playgrounds, family picnic areas, shade, and green space.

places.name: Cowabunga Bay
places.description: Family-friendly water park featuring slides, a lazy river, cabanas, and seasonal operation.

places.name: South Mountain Golf Course
places.address: 1247 E Mike Weir Dr, Draper, UT 84020
places.description: Public 18-hole, par-72 course offering mountain views and challenging play.

places.name: Wasatch Hang Gliding LLC
places.address: Point of the Mountain Flight Park, Draper, UT 84020
places.description: Offers hang-gliding instruction, tandem flights, gear sales & service.

places.name: TRAX Draper Town Center Station
places.description: Terminal stop on UTA TRAX Blue Line, with parking, accessibility, and outdoor waiting areas.
